title: [Large-scale] FAOBD Integrated English Curriculum Design: Multi-Case Study-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced English proficiency and foundational job-related vocabulary knowledge
context.additional_context: Corporate employee-targeted English curriculum conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments with a formative assessment-driven evaluation system

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and implement at least three educational utilization strategies for FAOBD.
Learners can develop at least one survey tool to assess the educational effectiveness of digital vocabulary tools.
Learners can simulate FAOBD-integrated lesson designs at least twice following multi-case study methodologies.
Learners can plan and execute FAOBD-based vocabulary learning activities at least five times in limited-technology environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
